location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Letter from Sir J. Outram received June 29. 1857.’

mods.abstract: This folio consists of a summary of a letter from Sir James Outram (in command of the British army in the Anglo-Persian War) to Lord Clarendon (George William Frederick Villiers, British Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs), dated Mohamra [Khorramshahr, Iran] 26 April 1857. The summary states: ‘Search for a salubrious position. Determination to send the Europeans to India – ’.

name.namePart: Commander of the Persian Expeditionary Force
